summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackThe Kiehl's Since 1851 Ultra Facial Cleanser is a mild foaming cleanser for all skin types.
details: DetailsBenefitsGently cleanses without over-drying or stripping skin of its natural oilsHelps dissolve excess oil, dirt and debrisTested for safety and gentlenesspH-balancedFor all skin types, including sensitive skinA customer favoriteKey IngredientsSqualane: a highly-refined botanical lipid derived from olives; with an exceptional affinity to skin, it absorbs easily and is known to help replenish skin's barrier keeping it soft, supple, and moisturizedApricot Kernels: derived from crushed apricot seeds and act as a gentle exfoliantAvocado Oil: has a rich, emollient texture and contains a balance of lipids including omega essential fatty acidsItem 2536613How To UseApply a small amount to damp face. Work into a generous lather using a gentle upward, circular motion, and avoiding the immediate eye area. Rinse thoroughly or remove with a damp wash cloth.IngredientsAqua/Water/Eau, Glycerin, Decyl Glucoside, Sodium C14-16 Olefin Sulfonate, Acrylates Copolymer, Disodium Cocoamphodiacetate, Lauryl Glucoside, Peg-200 Hydrogenated Glyceryl Palmate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Glycol Distearate, Pentylene Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Peg-7 Glyceryl Cocoate, Sodium Hydroxide, Citric Acid, Sodium Benzoate, Sodium Chloride, Hydroxyacetophenone, Benzoic Acid, Squalane, Glycine Soja Oil/Soybean Oil, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis Oil/Sweet Almond Oil, Prunus Armeniaca Kernel Oil/Apricot Kernel Oil, Tocopherol, Ascorbyl Glucoside, Persea Gratissima Oil/Avocado Oil.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply a small amount to damp face. Work into a generous lather using a gentle upward, circular motion, and avoiding the immediate eye area. Rinse thoroughly or remove with a damp wash cloth.
ingredients: Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis Oil/Sweet Almond Oil
Prunus Armeniaca Kernel Oil/Apricot Kernel Oil

reviews.headline: I wouldn't buy this product again from ulta beauty.
reviews.comments: Product came gooey and soaked. Understandable because it's HOT ü•µ not understandable that every time I buy this from ulta it comes half way full.

reviews.headline: Literal miracle worker
reviews.comments: Took this to band camp (10hrs a day outside for a full week in at LEAST 90 degree heat doing vigorous exercise) where i was sweating my booty off and not only did this prevent me from getting more acne it cleared up the acne i had had before band camp. They could charge $50 a bottle and id still buy!!!

reviews.headline: Great 2nd step for double cleansing
reviews.comments: I use this as a second step in double cleaning with the Kiehl's Midnight Recovery Botanical Cleansing Oil. It's a great combo! Love how soft my skin feels after using these!!

reviews.headline: Great 2nd step for double cleansing
reviews.comments: I use this as a second step in double cleaning with the Kiehl's Midnight Recovery Botanical Cleansing Oil. It's a great combo! Love how soft my skin feels after using these!!

reviews.headline: My go-to facewash
reviews.comments: I love this facewash. It's a gentle foaming cleanser that doesn't dry out my skin, but does a great job removing makeup and dirt. Can't recommend it enough.

reviews.headline: Lasts a long time!
reviews.comments: I only need to  use a little to remove foundation. It's a great product!  Non drying!

reviews.headline: Very nice product
reviews.comments: Easy to use

reviews.headline: Severe Breakouts
reviews.comments: I have oily/acne prone skin and am always looking for different products to see if they will improve. My sister gifted me a trial size. I had the worst acne of my life when using this product. I got deep, cystic acne on my chin and forehead (I rarely get acne on forehead) that took so long to heal after I stopped using it. I thought it was just the skin purging from a new product, but once I stopped using this product, new acne immediately stopped forming.

reviews.headline: Love this product!
reviews.comments: My skin loves this face wash, it makes me actually want to wash my face twice a day just to use the product! I have really sensitive skin that can be really dry but also prone to cystic acne and this product is clearing up my skin while keeping it hydrated and glowy! My skin looks more balanced and even after a week of using it, highly recommend!

reviews.headline: in love
reviews.comments: love it

reviews.headline: Amazing cleanser
reviews.comments: I have pretty sensitive skin, and this cleanser doesn't irritate it at all. I love how hydrated and clean my skin feels after using it. It does an excellent job, and the smell is really light, which I appreciate.

reviews.headline: Simple and effective, does have smell
reviews.comments: Just want to note off the top that this has almost a hot tub chlorine-like smell, but I find it somehow soothing and it's the main reason I keep coming back to this face wash, haha. I've used it for a couple of years now and find it always leaves my face feeling squeaky clean and refreshed. I can definitely see how it could be drying, like other reviews have said, but I follow it up with a pretty hydrating skincare routine and my skin feels clean, bouncy and fresh after. I have sensitive combo skin, can be prone to closed comedones, and I don't think this has ever aggravated my skin. I don't use this as my only cleanser - I use a cold cream to take my makeup off first and then use this after, so I don't know how effective it would be for removing makeup on its own. All in all, it gives me a lovely experience and is one of the very few skincare products I keep going back to.

reviews.headline: this burned my skin
reviews.comments: not sure what's in this but it burned my face. i do not recommend

reviews.headline: The Best
reviews.comments: My favorite facial cleanser the best

reviews.headline: Product shrinkage
reviews.comments: I've been purchasing this cleanser for some years despite how drying it is. Due to the shrinkage i wont be purchasing it anymore after 7yrs of using this product.

reviews.headline: ABSOLUTELY LOVE THIS PRODUCT!
reviews.comments: After searching and trying different facial cleansers that did not do my face justice, I finally found the one. After using them, my face with other products was either very dry or very oily. Not with this one! My face feels so clean and refreshed after using this. I use the elf holy hydration SPF and regular with this product and it works for me! I would recommend this product to anyone!

reviews.headline: So Gentle and Sweet!
reviews.comments:
I love this face wash! It's the only one that takes off eye makeup without burning my eyes.
It's just very gentle and easy-to-use.

reviews.headline: I like it, but....
reviews.comments: Kiel's is legendary, everything they have works really well. I hadn't tried this yet, and I'm pretty happy with it. It doesn't dry my skin out at all, and just the tiniest amount lathers up really nicely. The only complaint I have is the scent. It smells like a hospital. No bueno.

reviews.headline: the best
reviews.comments: this is the best face wash love it!!

reviews.headline: I loved this
reviews.comments: I loved this cleanser until I realized it was giving me cystic acne. I never had cystic acne before using this cleanser and as soon as I stopped using it my skin cleared up. I do think its a good cleaner but watch out in case it breaks you out.

media.headline: Caution! Product refromulated as of March 2024
media.caption: Comparison of March 2024 tube (left) to 2022 tube (right)

media.headline: Great product in awful packaging
media.caption: Transferring from the faulty packaging into a new container.

faceoff_positive.comments: I received the travel size as a gift and I absolutely fell in love with it. I went back and bought the full size in the store. Although it is more expensive than a drugstore brand cleanser, you get much more and it actually works. This product is a miracle worker. I am a teenager and I used to seriously break out and now I have not had a single breakout since I started using this cleanser. I saw amazing results after only a few days. If I was only allowed to use one cleanser for the rest of my life I would hands down choose this one.
faceoff_positive.headline: Best Purchase Ever

faceoff_negative.comments: Did not realize this product would be full of parabens when I ordered it! There were multiple parabens listed in the ingredients list on the container, however, the website didn't list them in the ingredients. Very frustrated about this. $20 down the drain. Not sure I will purchase anything else from Kiehl's if I can't be sure of whether it has parabens before I place my order!
faceoff_negative.headline: Parabens!!!
